snippet.title: StarbaseSim 2024 Trailer - Get it now on Epic Games Store! :)
snippet.description:
StarbaseSim will be available to purchase and play on Epic Games Store on Friday. You can now preview and wishlist it:

https://store.epicgames.com/p/starbasesim-f7c528

This will be basically the same as what supporters got until now. The current supporter version and store version are exactly the same. It will just be much more convenient to play like this, especially multiplayer.  You can find here, what that means for supporters: 
https://ko-fi.com/post/Epic-Games-Store-Preview-also-small-patch-and-org-Q5Q612AUJ1

Price is set to 12.30 $/€ with regional adjustments as suggested by Epic and only a few additional adjustments here and there by myself.
This includes all future updates. Development is planned to continue as before, if support is big enough. So similar updates as before, every one to two months normally.

Free Itch version will still be available, but with longer irregular update intervals: 
https://ashtorak.itch.io/starbase-simulator
The current store version will come to Itch, after the first update for the store version is out.
